name: koa-generic-session
description: koa generic session store by memory, redis or others
author: dead_horse <dead_horse@qq.com>

scripts.test-cov: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover _mocha -- -u exports --timeout 3000 --require should test/*.test.js
scripts.test-travis: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- -u exports --reporter 3000 --timeout 3000 --require should test/*.test.js
